title: Verify All available AL East items display on sub-menu page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are viewing Standings
AND we have access to the actual Standings via http://www.mlb.com/mlb/standings/
AND the current design - see __zpl.io/1Bq8Oo__
custom_steps: WHEN we observe the AL East Teams
custom_expected: THEN all the teams appear as expected

title: Verify Standings are accurate and updating for "Today"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are viewing Standings
AND we have access to the actual Standings via http://www.mlb.com/mlb/standings/
AND at least one game "Today" has moved to Final
custom_steps: WHEN we observe the various team records
custom_expected: THEN all the team records (W/L) appear as expected

title: Wild Card Disabled in Config
custom_preconds: Given the config that controls whether Wild Card is enabled or hidden is set to OFF
custom_steps: When the user launches the app And navigates to Settings > Standings
custom_expected: Then the user will see Division Standings And they will appear as expected And the Standings will be accurate: http://mlb.mlb.com/mlb/standings/index.jsp
